title: Material Cost Integration
description: Allow users to estimate material usage per booking and charge based on owner-defined cost per gram.

title: Review System
description: Allow users to leave reviews and ratings for completed bookings. Ratings should be visible on the printer listing.

title: Owner Earnings Dashboard
description: Show a breakdown of total earnings for owners, with charts grouped by booking, printer, or month.

title: Printer Tags & Filtering
description: Let owners add tags to their printers (e.g. PLA, high-speed, multi-color) and allow users to filter results by tag.

title: Listing Cap & Paid Tiers
description: Introduce a free listing cap (e.g. 2 printers) for owners, with paid subscription tiers to unlock more. Enforce cap in UI and database, and allow tier-based upgrades later via Stripe or Supabase roles.

title: Multi-Material Support Tags
description: Allow owners to tag printers with special capabilities like dual extrusion, resin printing, or multicolor support. Renters can filter by these tags.

title: Booking History Export
description: Let owners export their booking history and earnings as a downloadable CSV file for analysis or taxes.

title: Renter/Owner Messaging System
description: Add a messaging thread to booking pages so renters and owners can communicate directly, clarify print jobs, or request changes.

title: Referral Program
description: Give users a referral code or link to share. Referred users get a discount; the referrer earns credit or tips.

title: Printer Comparison Tool
description: Allow renters to compare multiple printer listings by price, rating, materials, and print volume in a side-by-side view.

title: Owner Onboarding Checklist
description: Add a guided checklist to help new owners complete their printer listing setup (photo, pricing, materials, etc).

title: Mobile Version of the Website
description: Build a responsive mobile-friendly version of the RentAPrint platform. Prioritize accessibility and usability on screens smaller than 640px using Tailwind CSS utilities. Key pages like homepage, listings, bookings, profile, and owner panel should adapt smoothly to mobile devices.
